definition: to set about (a task)/to hit/to punch/to touch
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
to come to blows/to paw/to grope/to get fresh
a gentleman uses his mouth and not his fist
pinyin: jun1 zi3 dong4 kou3 bu4 dong4 shou3

definition: (coll.) to tamper with/to mess around with
The sooner you set to work, the sooner you'll reap the rewards. (idiom)
pinyin: zao3 dong4 shou3 , zao3 shou1 huo4

definition: to do (sth) oneself/to help oneself to
to do the job oneself

sentences.english: And it illustrates the larger trend of home automation that is catching on among do-it-yourselfers.
sentences.chinese: 這說明家庭自動化的大趨勢就是自己動手。

sentences.english: The sailors took in sail when they saw the storm approach.
sentences.chinese: 水手們看見風暴快來了，就動手收帆。

sentences.english: I do a little bit of pencil drawing myself in miniature.
sentences.chinese: 我自己會動手畫一些微型鉛筆畫。

sentences.english: What better way to learn than a hands-on experience?
sentences.chinese: 沒有比動手實踐更好的學習方法了。

sentences.english: Griffith wanted to fight Paret on the spot but was restrained.
sentences.chinese: 格里菲斯當場就要動手，但被攔下了。

sentences.english: Others like to work on their own vehicles. Not Mitsuaki.
sentences.chinese: 有些人則喜歡自己動手修車。

sentences.english: She began unfastening the collar of her gown.
sentences.chinese: 她動手解她長袍的領子。
“你自己動手，”亞瑟不客氣地說。

sentences.english: It's my position that gentlemen should reason thing out rather than resort to force.
sentences.chinese: 我主張君子動口不動手。

sentences.english: I went over there, no punches, no shoves to the face, just confrontation.
sentences.chinese: 我走過去，沒有動手，我只是想跟他作個當面對質。

sentences.english: I was told that I could have had my leg cut off if they didn't operate on me very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 他們告訴我，如果不迅速動手術，我的腿就要被截去。

sentences.english: I've recorded the hands-on video below to give you a view of what it looks like.
sentences.chinese: 我記錄了動手視頻下面給你一個什麼樣子的看法。

sentences.english: Must sweeny perform an operation is ability complete?
sentences.chinese: 肌肉萎縮一定要動手術才能完全好嗎？

sentences.english: It's the easiest way to get vector geometry to edit directly, hands-down .
sentences.chinese: 這是最簡單的方法得到向量的幾何修改直接動手了。

sentences.english: You can do a roll-your-own version.
sentences.chinese: 你可以自己動手進行預測。

definition: to open one's mouth/to start to talk
to answer/to respond/to answer positively/to agree/to accept/to promise
a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
at once/immediately/promptly/swiftly
to sb's face/in sb's presence
to persuade/to convince/to talk sb over/Taiwan pr. [shui4 fu2]
to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
to speak/to say/to talk/to gossip/to tell stories/talk/word
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
hurriedly/without delay
at the scene/on the spot
to retort/to refute
to let off/to let slip by/to let sb get away with sth
in a word/in short/in brief
there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
